title: 84/540/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 October 1984 on applications for assistance from the European Communities concerning exceptional financial support for Greece in the social field, submitted by the Hellenic Republic (1984) (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 25 October 1984
on applications for assistance from the European Communities concerning exceptional financial support for Greece in the social field, submitted by the Hellenic Republic (1984)
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(84/540/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amount of aid agreed for each project is indicated in the Appendix.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
